muxarchive.Archive items can be found and installed: 在此获取并安装归档文件 - 包括存档、升级程序、主题等

muxassign.This is where you can assign a core or e: 在此分配RetroArch核心或独立模拟器

muxconfig.Customise your muOS setup with user crea: 使用用户创建的配置文件调整本机设置
muxconfig.Device specific and muOS frontend settin: 在此调节设备与muOS前端的设置选项
muxconfig.Find out what storage device core settin: 找出已安装了哪些存储设备核心设置和配置
muxconfig.Settings to change the power features of: Settings to change the power features of the device
muxconfig.Settings to change the visual aspects of: Settings to change the visual aspects of the frontend

muxconnect.Connect to a Wi-Fi network manually or v: Connect to a Wi-Fi network manually or via a saved profile
muxconnect.Toggle a range of configurable services: Toggle a range of configurable services you can access via an active network
muxconnect.Toggle between ADB and MTP USB functiona: Toggle between ADB and MTP USB functionality
muxconnect.Toggle the visibility of the bluetooth g: Toggle the visibility of the bluetooth glyph

muxcustom.Change how the font type works in the fr: Change how the font type works in the frontend - 'Theme' will ensure frontend will use fonts within themes with a fallback to language fonts - 'Language' will specifically use language based font
muxcustom.Change the display priority of the conte: Change the display priority of the content images
muxcustom.Change the screen alignment of the conte: Change the screen alignment of the content images
muxcustom.Load user created RetroArch configuratio: 加载用户创建的RA模拟器配置文件
muxcustom.Load user created artwork catalogue for: 载入用户为内容列表制作的封面集
muxcustom.Toggle the background animation of the c: Toggle the background animation of the current selected theme
muxcustom.Toggle the background music of the front: Toggle the background music of the frontend - This will stop if content is launched
muxcustom.Toggle the fade to black animation on co: Toggle the fade to black animation on content launching
muxcustom.Toggle the navigation sound of the front: Toggle the navigation sound of the frontend if the current theme supports it
muxcustom.Toggle the splash image on content launc: Toggle the splash image on content launching

muxgov.Configure CPU governors to dynamically a: 设置CPU调度方案，以动态调整CPU频率并针对能耗和性能优化

muxhdmi.Allows for testing different theme resol: 允许测试适配主题的不同分辨率
muxhdmi.Select the resolution for HDMI output, s: 选择HDMI输出分辨率，比如720p或1080p
muxhdmi.Set the color depth, such as 8-bit or 10: 选择HDMI输出色深为8位或10位
muxhdmi.Switch between overscan or underscan to: 选择HDMI输出过/欠扫描以对齐画面

muxinfo.Access statistics of played content and: 查看游玩内容或其他活动的统计列表
muxinfo.View all of the current muOS supporters: 查看当前所有muOS赞助者信息
muxinfo.View all of the screenshots taken on the: View all of the screenshots taken on the device
muxinfo.View the current used space of the mount: View the current used space of the mounted storage devices

muxlaunch.Content added to collections can be foun: 添加收藏的内容，在此处可启动
muxlaunch.Content on storage devices (SD1/SD2/USB): 查看并启动存储设备（SD1/SD2/USB）上的内容
muxlaunch.Content previously launched can be found: 查看并启动此前游玩过的内容
muxlaunch.Various applications can be found and la: 查看并启动各种应用程序

muxnetprofile.No Saved Network Profiles Found: 找不到保存的网络配置文件
muxnetprofile.Quickly switch between different Wi-Fi c: 快速切换Wi-Fi配置，以适应机器所在的特定位置或联网状态

muxnetscan.Detect, display and connect to available: 扫描、显示并连接可用Wi-Fi热点

muxnetwork.Connect to the network using options ent: 通过以上输入配置联网
muxnetwork.Enter the device IP address here (Static: 输入IP地址（仅适用于静态分配）
muxnetwork.Enter the device Subnet (CIDR) number he: 输入设备子网CIDR（仅适用于静态分配）
muxnetwork.Enter the network gateway address here (: 输入网关地址（仅适用于静态分配）
muxnetwork.Enter the network password here (optiona: 在此输入网络密码（可选）
muxnetwork.Toggle between DHCP and Static network t: 选择IP地址动态分配（DHCP）或静态分配
muxnetwork.Toggle whether or not to try and connect: 选择是否连接隐藏的WiFi热点

muxoption.Name: 名称
muxoption.Search for content within the selected d: 仅在本文件夹搜索内容
muxoption.Set the CPU governor for the selected co: 为选中的内容或文件夹设置CPU调度方案
muxoption.Set the system core or external emulator: 为选中的内容或文件夹分配RetroArch核心或独立模拟器

muxplore.Content is not associated with system or: 内容未和模拟器/核心设置关联
muxplore.Folders cannot be added to collections: 文件夹不能加入收藏夹

muxpower.Configure how the power button functions: 设置长按电源键（2秒）的操作
muxpower.Configure the time the device will sleep: 设置无操作后等待设备睡眠的时长
muxpower.Configure the time the screen will dim w: 设置无操作后等待关屏时长
muxpower.Configure when the red LED will display: 设置亮红灯的时机，基于电量百分比
muxpower.Idle Input Display Timeout: 无操作后关屏等待时长
muxpower.Idle Input Sleep Timeout: 无操作后睡眠等待时长

muxrtc.Change your current date, time, and time: 设置您目前的日期、时间和时区

muxsearch.Enter in the name of the content you are: 输入您要寻找的内容名称
muxsearch.Search all current active storage device: 在所有启动的存储设备中搜索
muxsearch.Search within the current selected folde: 在选择的文件夹和子文件夹中搜索

muxsnapshot.Restore your saved game progress from a: 从上一个即时存档文件恢复游戏进度

muxspace.View the current used space of the mount: View the current used space of the mounted storage devices

muxstorage.Assigned Core/Governor System: 分配核心/调度方案系统
muxstorage.Location of assigned core and governor c: 分配核心和调度方案的设置路径
muxstorage.Location of save states and files: 游戏存档和即时存档文件路径
muxstorage.Save Games + Save States: 游戏存档 + 即时存档

muxsysinfo.The current detected battery capacity: 当前探测到的电池剩余容量
muxsysinfo.The current detected battery voltage: 当前探测到的电池电压
muxsysinfo.The current device type detected and con: 当前探测或配置的设备类型
muxsysinfo.The current running governor of the devi: 当前设备使用的CPU调度方案
muxsysinfo.The current running time of the system: 当前系统自开机起运行的时长
muxsysinfo.The current, and total, memory usage of: 当前的内存用量及总量

muxtester.Press any button to start input testing!: 按下任意按键开始测试输入!

muxtweakadv.Adjust the rate of speed when holding na: 调整按住导航按键时菜单滚动速度
muxtweakadv.Adjust the system swapfile if required b: 按部分运行要求分配虚拟内存
muxtweakadv.Change how the device buttons work globa: 切换系统按键操作特征
muxtweakadv.Change the default audio level that the: 设置开机时的默认音量大小
muxtweakadv.Change the default brightness level that: 设置开机时的默认亮度
muxtweakadv.Change the default theme used for the ne: 设置是否下次开机时更换默认主题
muxtweakadv.Change the displayed battery percentage: 设置电池容量计数偏移值以满足对电池容量的准确计数
muxtweakadv.Toggle a delayed start of RetroArch unti: 设置是否在确认联网前暂缓RetroArch启动
muxtweakadv.Toggle startup and shutdown verbose mess: 设置开关机时是否输出日志消息
muxtweakadv.Toggle the functionality of the power bu: 设置是否开启电源按键切换十字键功能
muxtweakadv.Toggle the functionality of the user ini: 设置在设备启动时切换用户初始化脚本的功能
muxtweakadv.Toggle the passcode lock - More informat: 设置密码锁 - 详情查看muOS官网
muxtweakadv.Toggle the power LED during content laun: 设置内容启动时的LED行为
muxtweakadv.Toggle the system ability to automatical: 设置是否过热时自动关机
muxtweakadv.Toggle vibration for device startup, sle: 设置开关机及睡眠时是否振动

muxtweakgen.Change the brightness of the device to a: 调整显示亮度为具体值
muxtweakgen.Change the colour temperature of the dis: 设置显示色温（需设备支持）
muxtweakgen.Change the volume of the device to a spe: Change the volume of the device to a specific level
muxtweakgen.Change where the device will start up in: 设置开机进入的默认界面
muxtweakgen.Change your current date, time, and time: Change your current date, time, and timezone

muxvisual.Changes the top title label in Explore C: 设置内容浏览器顶栏是否在文件夹名后显示正在查看的存储设备
muxvisual.Display Title Reformatting: 显示标题格式调整（英文）
muxvisual.Rearranges the label of content to move: （英文语境）将文件名的“..., The”格式调整为“The ...”格式
muxvisual.Remove extra information from content la: 删除内容名包含的标记信息 - 仅更改内容列表里显示的内容名，文件名不更改
muxvisual.Replaces the dash (-) with a colon (:) f: 将内容名里的连接号（-）更换为冒号（:）
muxvisual.Replaces the label of shortened content: 将使用字母简称的内容目录名更换为其对应的平台全名
muxvisual.Toggle hidden content displayed in Explo: Toggle hidden content displayed in Explore Content - Place a '.' or '_' character at the start of a file or folder name to hide it
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of currently selec: 设置内容浏览器是否在查看文件夹时，显示子文件夹序号和总数
设置内容浏览器是否在查看文件夹时，显示文件序号和总数
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of empty folders i: 设置检索内容时是否显示空文件夹
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the item count: 设置内容浏览器是否在文件夹名称后显示该文件夹内的项目数量

muxwebserv.Toggle Resilio - WebUI can be found on p: 设置Resilio同步 - 通过端口6060进入WebUI界面
muxwebserv.Toggle SFTP support - WebUI can be found: 设置SFTP支持 - 通过端口9090连接
muxwebserv.Toggle SSH support - Access via port 22: 设置SSH支持 - 通过端口22连接
muxwebserv.Toggle Syncthing - WebUI can be found on: 设置Syncthing同步 - 通过端口7070进入WebUI界面
muxwebserv.Toggle Tailscale - Need to login via SSH: 开关Tailscale（需要先通过SSH登录来配置）
muxwebserv.Toggle network time protocol for active: 对于激活的网络链接设置网络时间协议支持
muxwebserv.Toggle virtual terminal - WebUI can be f: 设置虚拟终端 - 通过端口8080进入WebUI界面
